game_name: Demo Game: Destiny of the Cube

description: You are in a bright room with orange walls.
Along the walls you see a grid in thin grey lines and measurements listed.
You can't see where the light it coming from, it just seems to emanate from the centre of the room.
This room is similarly decorated to the previous one.
There is a large grey cube in the corner with the same measurements and grid on it, as on the walls.
This room is similarly decorated to the previous one.
In the centre of the room, you can see a wrought-iron garden table.
You have reached the end of the demo game.
Now go forth and make better games of your own.
Thanks for playing!

doors.name: Large Ornate Door
description: To the east, you see a <Large Ornate Door>, covered with fine carvings of acanthus leaves,
and decorated with shimmering gold trim.

Gold Key: The large gold key effortlessly spins in the lock and suddenly disappears.
A loud creaking can be heard as the ornate doors swing open automatically.
Cannon: You're not supposed to have a cannon!
Alright, fine. But just this once...
You load the cannon and aim it at the ornate doors.
"FIRE!" you yell, pulling the cord. A heavy ball of dark metal flies out of the cannon and strikes the grand doors.
The doors flash in and out of existence rapidly, before a satisfying jingle plays and they disappear for good.
